text: Roberto Márquez is a field hockey player, who competed for Argentina at the 1948 Summer Olympics, he played in all three group games and scored in the matches against India and Spain. ==References== Category:Olympic field hockey players of Argentina Category:Argentine male field hockey players Category:Possibly living people Category:Argentine field hockey biography stubs Category:Field hockey players at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Year of birth missing
title: Roberto Márquez (field hockey)
